Summary: Blue orb traveling north of Horsetooth res,
divs: Sighting DetailsI don't feel comfortable writing the story out here. I'm more than willing to talk over the phone, but I could spend 30mins doing it and I still wouldn't be happy with it. It's something better told than read, or at least written by me. Sorry.
